headline: Toy Stocks Climb Following Trump's 90-Day Tariff Pause
summary: By Connor Hart Toy stocks rallied after President Trump placed a 90-day pause on some of the reciprocal tariffs he unleashed this week. In afternoon trading Wednesday, shares of Mattel rose...

headline: Hasbro, Inc. (HAS): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Hasbro, Inc. (HAS) on Substack by The Reservist. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on HAS. Hasbro, Inc. (HAS)’s share was trading at $50.71 as of April 8th. HAS’s trailing and forward P/E were 18.44 and 11.99 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Hasbro represents a compelling investment […]
